Nations are slowly but surely moving to cleaner sources of electricity.

After taking a first pass at this map in late 2021 with data from the [International Renewable Energy Agency](https://www.irena.org), we updated this in 2022 and 2023 in time for the [annual UN climate talks](https://unfccc.int/).
